page.title: 14Museum Attendant-Interview.
page.content: When we visited Cyfarthfa Castle Museum we interviewed the attendant Mr.Tudor Morgan.He had been working there for many years.He enjoyed his work particularly when talking to the visitors about Merthyr's past.People sometimes came from as far away as America to try and trace their Welsh ancesters.Mr. Morgan told us how he was fascinated by their life stories. However there were things he did not like about the job:he spent most of the day standing which was very tiring,and it could be a rather lonely job.Although he enjoyed the job he was looking forward to his retirement when he could give more time to his hobbies of drawing,dancing and playing the organ.He said he would like to move to the south coast and live in a bungalow.
